short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest software test scenario recorder for Autify, an AI-based software testing automation tool.
short.ja: AIを用いたソフトウェアテスト自動化ツール Autify のシナリオ記録を行う Chrome Extension です。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of Autify
- Anyone can easily automate test scenarios with this Chrome Extension.
- Manage test scenarios and test schedules on the management console.
- Cross-browser testing (including mobile browsers)
- AI-based test scenario self-maintenance.

Register here
https://autify.com
long.ja:
The simplest software test scenario recorder for Autify, an AI-based software testing automation tool.

Features of Autify
- Anyone can easily automate test scenarios with this Chrome Extension.
- Manage test scenarios and test schedules on the management console.
- Cross-browser testing (including mobile browsers)
- AI-based test scenario self-maintenance.

Register here
https://autify.com
